props.name: content
props.description:
The block content is an object of values, depending
on the block type.

props.name: fieldset
props.description: The fieldset definition with all fields, tabs, etc.

props.name: id
props.description: A unique ID for the block

props.name: isBatched
props.description: If `true` the block is selected together with other blocks

props.name: isFull
props.description: If `true` the blocks field is full and no more blocks can be added

props.name: isHidden
props.description: If `true` the block is hidden on the frontend

props.name: isLastSelected
props.description:
If `true` the block is the last selected item in a list of batched blocks.
The last one shows the toolbar.

props.name: isMergable
props.description: If `true` the block can be merged with another selected block when it is batched.

props.name: isSelected
props.description: If `true` the block is marked as selected

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the block is added to the endpoints

props.name: next
props.description: The definition of the next block if there's one.

props.name: prev
props.description: The definition of the previous block if there's one.
